title: Report a Water Main Break
description: A citizen reports water gushing from the street, indicating a likely water main break.

tasks.description: Gather the exact location of the break.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the address and cross-street of the break.

tasks.description: Recognize the urgency of the situation and escalate it immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent flags the service request as an emergency.

tasks.description: Create an emergency work order and dispatch the on-call crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order and immediately dispatches a crew to the location.
